summary: Diff implements a 4-page static TanStack Router site (Home, Types & Guide, Reviews, Top Picks) with a shared Tailwind-based layout/theme and detailed static content, including a hero image reference on Home. However, the required generated image assets are not evidenced as added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and additional required images (note icons + mist background) are not shown as used. The diff also introduces Internet Identity/auth + actor/query plumbing, which appears outside the static-content/non-goals scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include required static images in the frontend public assets folder and render them in the UI (hero/headers and section accents) without routing images through the backend.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the hero image path, but the diff does not show any images added under frontend/public/assets/generated. Also, there is no evidence the required note-icons image or fragrance-mist background image exists or is rendered anywhere.
evidence: ADDED FILES list does not include frontend/public/assets/generated/*

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and identity-based actor creation with React Query caching/refetch logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude Internet Identity login and personalized user data; the site should be a static-content experience not depending on backend/auth for content.
evidence: frontend/src/main.tsx (wraps app with InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider)

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister stub added despite static frontend requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is a static-content perfume website with no backend calls required for page content; adding a backend actor is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai referral/attribution link in footer with window.location dependency.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest requirements; adds external referral behavior unrelated to perfume content.
